code:
flowchart TD
    subgraph "Input Data"
        A1[Education_LMS_Portal]
        A2[Education_ClassroomService]
        A3[Education_LMS_Portal]
    end

    subgraph "Step 1: Load Data"
        B1[Education_GradeSync]
        B2[Education_LMS_Portal]
        B3[Education_ClassroomService]

        A1 --> B1
        A2 --> B2
        A3 --> B3
    end

    subgraph "Step 2: Coordinate Alignment"
        C1[Education_GradeSync]
        C2{Education_ContentCDN}
        C3[Education_ContentCDN]
        C4[Education_GradeSync]

        B2 --> C1
        C1 --> C2
        C2 -->|Yes| D1
        C2 -->|No| C3
        C3 --> C4
        C4 --> D1
    end

    subgraph "Step 3: Quality Control"
        D1[Education_ClassroomService]
        D2[Education_ContentCDN]
        D3[Education_ClassroomService]

        D1 --> D2
        D2 --> D3
    end

    subgraph "Step 4: Patch Extraction"
        E1[Education_StudentDB]
        E2[Education_StudentDB]
        E3[Education_ClassroomService]
        E4[Education_GradeSync]
        E5[Education_GradeSync]

        D3 --> E1
        E1 --> E2
        E2 --> E3
        E3 --> E4
        E4 --> E5
    end

    subgraph "Step 5: Spatial Graph"
        F1[Education_GradeSync]
        F2[Education_GradeSync]
        F3[Education_StudentDB]
        F4[Education_LMS_Portal]

        E5 --> F1
        F1 --> F2
        F2 --> F3
        F3 --> F4
    end

    subgraph "Step 6: Save Dataset"
        G1[Education_StudentDB]
        G2[Education_ClassroomService]
        G3[Education_ContentCDN]
        G4[Education_StudentDB]

        E5 --> G1
        F4 --> G2
        B3 --> G3
        G1 --> G4
        G2 --> G4
        G3 --> G4
    end

    subgraph "Output: Ready for Training"
        H1[Education_ContentCDN]
        H2[Education_ContentCDN]
        H3[Education_ClassroomService]

        G4 --> H1
        H1 --> H2
        H2 --> H3
    end

    style A1 fill:#ffe1e1
    style A2 fill:#ffe1e1
    style B1 fill:#e1f5ff
    style E5 fill:#fff4e1
    style F4 fill:#ffe1f5
    style H3 fill:#e1ffe1
